mapper.select: SELECT tag.tag_id, tag.tag_name tagName, tag.tag_category_id, tag.create_time createTime FROM portal_tag tag LEFT JOIN portal_article_tag sbat ON tag.tag_id = sbat.tag_id LEFT JOIN portal_article pa ON pa.article_id = sbat.article_id WHERE pa.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY tag.create_time DESC
